    • Constructor Detail

      • Executor

        public Executor(java.util.concurrent.ThreadFactory threadFactory,
        java.util.concurrent.BlockingQueue queue,
        Executor.Controller controller,
        int initialThreadCount,
        java.util.EnumSet<Stats.Metric> metrics,
        long samplePeriod,
        long controlPeriod,
        java.util.concurrent.TimeUnit unit)
        Parameters:
        threadFactory - the ThreadFactory used by the executor
        queue - the queue that holds Runnable objects waiting to be executed
        controller - the Controller object that updates the thread count
        metrics - the metrics that will be collected and delivered to the controller
        initialThreadCount - the number of threads that the executor will begin with
        samplePeriod - the period at which the executor's state will be sampled
        controlPeriod - the period at which the controller will be invoked with the gathered statistics
        unit - the time unit for the #samplePeriod and #controlPeriod

    • Method Detail

      • getMetrics

        public java.util.EnumSet<Stats.Metric> getMetrics()
        Returns:
        the metrics being gathered by the executor

      • getLastStats

        public Stats getLastStats()
        Returns:
        the last aggregate statistics given to the control loop.

      • getStats

        public Stats getStats()
        Returns:
        the aggregate statistics for the executor since the last control loop update.

      • executeWithoutRejection

        public void executeWithoutRejection(java.lang.Runnable runnable)
                             throws java.lang.NullPointerException,
                                    java.lang.InterruptedException
        A version of execute which will simply block until the task is accepted, rather than throwing a RejectedExceptionException. RejectedExecutionException will only be thrown if the executor is shut down.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException
        java.lang.InterruptedException
